CustomField.formula:
OR( AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL(MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13')), TEXT( $User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) == TECH_ZONE__c ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13'), ISPICKVAL($User.Country__c,'KOREA'), TECH_ZONE__c == 'KOREA' ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13'), ISPICKVAL($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c, '13'), TECH_ZONE__c = '13', NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.Country__c,'KOREA')) ) )
CustomField.label: My Management Level Zone
